briefTitle: CSL312 (Garadacimab) in the Prevention of Hereditary Angioedema Attacks
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-arm Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Subcutaneous Administration of CSL312 (Garadacimab) in the Prophylactic Treatment of Hereditary Angioedema
summary: This is a multicenter, double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel-arm study to investigate the efficacy and safety of subcutaneous administration of CSL312 (garadacimab) in the prophylactic treatment of hereditary angioedema.

primaryOutcome.measure: Time-Normalized Number of Hereditary Angioedema (HAE) Attacks Per Month During Treatment Period
